message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would be a valuable asset to you. Given its worth of $15,000 to you, I am offering it to you for $14,000. This is a special offer considering the high value this product holds for both of us.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying.  I'm willing to go up to $13,000.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. Considering the mutual benefits, I am willing to adjust my offer slightly to $13,500. This is a fair compromise, taking into account the value you see in the product and my current pricing strategy.
